channel.title: Entertainment
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Entertainment, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Tom Bergeron to Return to the “Dancing with the Stars” Ballroom 5 Years After His Firing
item.description: Bergeron, who hosted the show for 28 seasons, previously said his final season wasn't a "pleasant" one due to conflict behind the scenes
